extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN100 or FREN110 or (FREN101 and FREN102).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN232 or FREN312 or FREN300.

basic.description: A course focusing on the socio-cultural and political aspects of African and Caribbean cinemas.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Cinéma et société: aspects culturels de la francophonie
